data.title: Joann Bonanno Will Be the Bride Of T.B. Walker 3d
data.text:
The engagement of Joann Virginia Bonanno to Thomas Bidwell Walker 3d has been announced by Dr. and Mrs. Anthony J. Bonanno of Garden City and Peconic, L.I., parents of the prospective bride. Mr. Walker is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Thomas B. Walker Jr. of Dallas.

A January wedding is planned in New York.

The couple are with Goldman, Sachs & Company, the investment banking and brokerage firm. She is with the municipal finance department and he is an associate in the corporate finance department.

The bride-to-be graduated magna cum laude from St. John's University and received a master's degree from the Columbia University Graduate School of Business Administration. Her father, principal of Calhoun High School in Merrick, L.I., is also an educational administrator for the Bellmore-Merrick Central High School District on Long Island. Her late maternal grandfather, Louis M. Perry, was founder and president of Travel Associates Inc. in New York.

Mr. Walker was graduated magna cum laude from Princeton University and received a master's degree from the Stanford University Graduate School of Business. His father is a partner and a member of the management committee of Goldman, Sachs & Company and vice chairman of the board of trustees of Vanderbilt University.
